meanings.definition: A person from the eastern part of a region or country.
meanings.sent1: Many easterners enjoy watching the sunrise over the mountains.
meanings.sent2: The easterners in our town celebrate their traditions with colorful festivals.
meanings.sent3: The easterners decided to have a picnic at the crack of dawn.
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the crowd like an easterner in the west.
meanings.sent5: The easterners' accents were as distinct as the rising sun.

meanings.sent1: The map showed a group of easterners traveling together.
meanings.sent2: The easterners gathered to discuss their upcoming trip.
meanings.sent3: The easterners formed a line to board the train.
meanings.sent4: The team of easterners moved in unison like a flock of birds.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the easterners filled the room with warmth.
